column4: please! someone I need to make MPLAYER defaault...all the guides have led me astray
firestarter gettooo
no problem
How can I play wmv or realplayer files from firefox????
have you installed mozilla-mplayer and also the w32codecs
I have mplayer-mozzilla...but totem is my defail player
check if libtotem* files exist here /usr/lib/mozilla-firefox/plugins
mv libtotem* oldtotemfiles (move to totem plugins)
you may also need to remove totem-mozilla if installed sudo apt-get remove totem-mozilla
my player now comes up...but no videos are playing
also /usr/bin/win32 and /usr/local/lib/codecs
I don't have any of those directorys
then >sudo ln -s /usr/lib/codecs /usr/lib/win32
and > sudo ln -s /usr/lib/codecs /usr/local/lib/codecs
that should do it restart firefox and should be fine
yeah
whats the page can you send me link and see if it works for me
checking cnn now one sec
did you download the deb package and install as i instructed
check you have the /usr/lib/codecs folder and it has files in it
